params.footer_content: “I don't use kids to build robots. I use robots to build kids.” - Dean Kamen

about.content: AENTA Robotics Team is a dedicated and dynamic group of students who share a passion for robotics and compete in the FIRST (For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology) program. Guided by the core values of FIRST, our team strives to embody the principles of inclusivity, gracious professionalism, coopertition, continuous learning, and community engagement.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.content: Join thousands of our beloved subscribers and get info about new opportunities!
